comment.author: 29350288@N06
comment._content: St. Charles Avenue streetcar. Earlier NARA gif upload gives date of July 1972. I'm an admin for a group called Uptown New Orleans, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 35740357@N03
comment._content:
Hello Infrogmation,

     Thank you for your interest in our photo of the St. Charles Avenue streetcar.  You are more than welcome to upload it to your group.
